CustomField.description: **System Calculated** Link to the gift credit assignee record.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Entity__c,"Account"),HYPERLINK("/" & DonorApi__Account__r.Id, DonorApi__Account__r.Name), IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Entity__c,"Contact"),HYPERLINK("/" & DonorApi__Contact__r.Id, DonorApi__Contact__r.FirstName & " " & DonorApi__Contact__r.LastName),HYPERLINK("/" & DonorApi__User__r.Id, DonorApi__User__r.FirstName & " " & DonorApi__User__r.LastName)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** Link to the gift credit assignee record.
CustomField.label: Assignee
